revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Smartenit |model=Harmony |revision=P2 (6007C) |asin=B07B9PSL1M, B00JPS4H1Q;CA; |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |price=60 |fcc_date=03/14/2012 |fcc_id=TYOJN5148M3 |ic_id=7438A-CYO5148M3 |type=home automation controller, IoT |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6192 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 6-pin header,, J17 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pad header,, (115200 8N1),, J11 |wi1_module=Jennic JN5148-001 |wi1_module_if=Serial |wi1_802dot11_protocols=ZigBee |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= 30V, 7A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS8984;;1;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT8105;;1;,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;TI;TPS65251;;1; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, Zigbee |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Cloud Engines (3.2.27); |stock_os=Linux;3.3.8; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Debian |802dot11_protocols=ZigBee |oui=D8:1C:14 |oui_eth=00:25:31 }} {{TagLine|Home Automation Hub}} :[https://smartenit.com/shop/zigbee-insteon-x10-multi-protocol-gateway-hub/ Product page]
This is a relabeled [[Cloud Engines Pogoplug v4 A1 (Mobile)]] :with a Jennic [[ZigBee]] card attached to the serial pins.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] Kirkwood 88F6192 @1.0GHz *Storage: 128MB (NAND) flash, :TF card (max.32GB)/MMC card *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Wireless: Zigbee (802.15.4) *Power Source: 12V/1A via barrel
===See also=== *[[Smartenit Harmony G1]] (6007D) *[[Smartenit Harmony G2]] (6007E) *[[Smartenit Harmony P2]] (6007C)
__NOTOC__
